home.subtitulo:
The support you needed.
It's never been easier to be Aesthetic!
home.proposta_card_1_desc: Control your calories, macros, water, and sleep here at Gabgym. Now it's up to you.
home.proposta_card_2_desc: Beginner looking for what to train? A veteran looking for variations? Open the workouts tab and be happy.
home.proposta_card_3_desc: Yes, you can also do your cardio and track your distance, time, and calories burned live.
home.proposta_card_4_desc: Here you'll learn about the most famous topics in the fitness world. Stay on top of nutrition, supplementation, and workout myths.
home.proposta_card_5_desc: In this tab, you can give me your surgical point of view and suggest improvements for the app's proper functioning! Much appreciated.

metas.saudacao: Hello, {{name}}! Based on your profile, these are your recommended daily goals for the objective of {{objective}}.
metas.manutencao_desc: This is what you burn on a normal day, just to maintain your current state.
metas.meta_diaria_desc: To achieve your goal of {{objective}}, follow this target.

profile_form.descricao: Fill in your details so GabGym can create a fully personalized experience for you.
profile_form.modal_texto: Are your details correct? They will be used for all calculations in the app.

biblioteca.subtitulo: Your complete guide to the world of bodybuilding. Browse the topics below.
